QLabel.errorSemester: An error occurred while loading the semester.
QLabel.alertSemester: Alert semester, find a way to improve !
QLabel.noUE: Unable to load UEs, this might be due to a weird OGE format.
QLabel.allBelow8: All UEs are below 8/20, work harder if you want to pass !
QLabel.newGrade: A new grade has been added to the gradebook !
QLabel.newGrades: %s new grades have been added to the gradebook !

QToolTip.ogeWeird:
OGE is weird, this is not a bug of OGE Next.
Your average will be correct when OGE will give the correct data.
QToolTip.ogeWeirdTop: This information may be incorrect, see the tooltips of the UEs for more information.

QLabel.invalidData:
Invalid and/or incomplete data, unable to load the average.
Make sure all the semesters are loaded.
QLabel.noUE: Unable to load UEs, this might be due to OGE not giving all the data.
QLabel.between8And10:
UEs between 8/20 and 10/20 to improve :
%s

Note: if the semester is finished and theses UEs are not available next year, you won't pass the year.
QLabel.below8:
UEs below 8/20 to improve :
%s

Note: if the semester is finished, you won't pass the year.
QLabel.noGeneralAverage: Unable to calculate the general average, some data is missing.

QToolTip.ogeWeird:
OGE is weird, this is not a bug of OGE Next.
Your average will be correct when OGE will give the correct data.
QToolTip.ogeWeirdTop: This information may be incorrect, see the tooltips of the UEs for more information.
